column2: "Oya oya. Hi , hello there. Lisa is in the process of training with a partner."
"You're late, Marlu. I already shot all of the enemies in this area into bits and pieces."
"...That's because Lisa is too fast. You don't say anything and you keep pressing on too far ahead."
"That's not it at all. Since this is training with Force and Ranger, then Lisa needs to stand out a little."
"Rangers lock down a group of enemies while Forces finish them off with one attack. This is how it's supposed to be."
"Well, Lisa is getting a little carried away and killing everything."
"That doesn't do anything in terms of my training."
"That doesn't matter. Do you think that being this slow, you can show your face in front of other Forces?"
"But if you pair with a Hunter, the pace shouldn't be too different from this."
"If you're too slow in general, then you'll just get left behind. Are you okay with that?"
